labirinto.logic

Class Labirinto

  • java.lang.Object
    • labirinto.logic.Labirinto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GridQueryable<java.lang.Character>

    public class Labirinto
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, GridQueryable<java.lang.Character>
    Class that represents the actual game. This class contains the functions to initialize the game process its turns.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Labirinto()
      Generates an instance of Labirinto with the predefined maze and a dragon that stands permanently still.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Labirinto

        public Labirinto()
        Generates an instance of Labirinto with the predefined maze and a dragon that stands permanently still.

      • Labirinto

        public Labirinto(Terreno[][] formatoTabuleiro,
                 int dimensao,
                 int dragoes,
                 Estrategia estrategia)
        Constructor for the Labirinto class
        Parameters:
        formatoTabuleiro - layout of the maze
        dimensao - size of the maze
        dragoes - number of dragons to put in the maze
        estrategia - strategy to apply to the dragons

      • Labirinto

        public Labirinto(Terreno[][] formatoTabuleiro,
                 int dimensao,
                 int dragoes,
                 Estrategia estrategia,
                 Posicao heroPos,
                 Posicao swordPos,
                 Posicao dragonPos,
                 Posicao shieldPos,
                 Posicao javPos)
        Special constructor used only for testing purposes
        Parameters:
        formatoTabuleiro - the terrain of the maze
        dimensao - size of the maze
        dragoes - number of dragons
        estrategia - strategy to assign to the game
        heroPos - position of the hero within the maze
        swordPos - position of the sword within the maze
        dragonPos - position of the first dragon within the maze
        shieldPos - position of the shield within the maze
        javPos - position of the javelin within the maze
        See Also:
        TestLabirinto
